value.panelsJSON: [{"gridData": {"h": 2, "i": "1", "w": 7, "x": 0, "y": 0}, "id": "gitee_issues_openissues_statistics", "panelIndex": "1", "title": "Open Issues Statistics", "type": "visualization", "version": "6.1.0-3"}, {"gridData": {"h": 2, "i": "18", "w": 5, "x": 7, "y": 0}, "id": "gitee_issues_backlog_waiting_to_be_closed", "panelIndex": "18", "title": "Backlog", "type": "visualization", "version": "6.1.0-3"}, {"gridData": {"h": 7, "i": "19", "w": 4, "x": 0, "y": 8}, "id": "gitee_issues_backlog_submitters", "panelIndex": "19", "title": "Backlog Submitters", "type": "visualization", "version": "6.1.0-3"}, {"gridData": {"h": 6, "i": "20", "w": 7, "x": 0, "y": 2}, "id": "gitee_issues_backlog", "panelIndex": "20", "title": "Backlog (Open Issues)", "type": "visualization", "version": "6.1.0-3"}, {"gridData": {"h": 2, "i": "21", "w": 5, "x": 7, "y": 2}, "id": "gitee_issues_backlog_waiting_to_be_closed_accumulated_time", "panelIndex": "21", "title": "Backlog: Issues (Accumulated Time)", "type": "visualization", "version": "6.1.0-3"}, {"gridData": {"h": 4, "i": "22", "w": 5, "x": 7, "y": 4}, "id": "gitee_issues_open_organizations", "panelIndex": "22", "title": "Organizations", "type": "visualization", "version": "6.1.0-3"}, {"gridData": {"h": 7, "i": "23", "w": 4, "x": 4, "y": 8}, "id": "gitee_issues_organizations_backlog", "panelIndex": "23", "title": "Organizations", "type": "visualization", "version": "6.1.0-3"}, {"gridData": {"h": 7, "i": "24", "w": 4, "x": 8, "y": 8}, "id": "gitee_issues_projects_backlog", "panelIndex": "24", "title": "Projects", "type": "visualization", "version": "6.1.0-3"}]

value.visState: {"title":"gitee_issues_openissues_statistics","type":"metric","params":{"fontSize":"12","metric":{"percentageMode":false,"useRanges":false,"colorSchema":"Green to Red","metricColorMode":"None","colorsRange":[{"from":0,"to":10000}],"labels":{"show":true},"invertColors":false,"style":{"bgFill":"#000","bgColor":false,"labelColor":false,"subText":"","fontSize":"12"}},"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":false,"type":"metric"},"aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","schema":"metric","params":{"customLabel":"Open Issues"}},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"sum","schema":"metric","params":{"field":"time_open_days","customLabel":"Accumulated Open Days"}},{"id":"3","enabled":true,"type":"avg","schema":"metric","params":{"field":"painless_delay","customLabel":"Average Time Open per Issue"}}]}
